price: Kuma Muka bar sãshensu a rãnar nan, yanã garwaya a cikin sãshe, kuma aka bũsa a cikin ƙaho sai muka tãra su, tãrãwa.*
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا
footnotes: * Allah Ya nũna yadda hãlin da Zulƙarnaini ya bar Yãjũj da Mãjũj, watau sun garwaya a cikin jũnansu, sa'an nan kuma wannan ma'anar aka bãyar da ita ga mutãne waɗanda ke bin son ransu, bã su bin shari'ar Allah, sunã hargitse a tsakãninsu, har a yi bũsar farko, su mutu, kuma a yi bũsa ta biyu su tãshi a cikin hargitsinsu, sai kuma a gitta Jahannama gaba gare su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
